pages.title: Waystones
pages.text: Waystone allow for interdimensional travel. They seem to be made with the same magic as Runestones, but are more powerful.$(br)You will find Waystones on top of $(l:exploration/towers)Towers$() or sometimes in Villages. You will be able to activate them, but not to bring them with you, as they are imbued with strong magic making them indestructible.
